attributes.additional_details: on april 29th 2015 a prisoner with severe asthma died due to the wardens refusing to give him his inhaler,since that date numerous other inmates have died due to lack of care,lack of responsibility,no matter what the prisoner has done and what sentence they are receiving they do not expect to be treated inhumanely and have their medication messed with,also numerous wardens have been sacked due to breaking protocol by mocking prisoners and their deafs on their own social networking pages
attributes.background: In the last 4 months prisoners have died due to neglect,they've had cuts on their food and showers and are being treated like animals,no matter what a prisoner has done they don't deserve to die the way they have,wardens are taking away medical equipment from them and treating them inhumanely
